instruction: My name is Kamal.
How are you?
I am fine.
Where do you live?
I live in Pushp Vihar opposite to Shiv Temple.
output: Me shiv mandir ka saamani Pushp Vihar maa rau(n)du.

instruction: In which class do you read?
I read in eleventh class.
What is the name of your school?
output: Tumaari school ka naam kyaa cha?

instruction: The name of my school is GIC Narayan Nagar.
output: Meri school ka naam GIC Narayan Nagar cha.

instruction: How many brothers and sister do you have?
I have a younger brother and a elder sister.
output: Myaar ek chotu bhai cha aur badi bhuli cha.

instruction: What are you doing these days?
I am preparing for Civil Services Exams.
output: Me Civil Services ka tyaari kanu chaun.

instruction: What did your father do?
My father is serving Indian Army.
How is your grandfather feeling now?
He is fine now.
Where in Uttaranchal are you from?
I am from Champawat in Kumaon.
output: Me Kumaon bitik chaoun. Champawat naam cha myar gaon ka.

instruction: Had you ever been to Nainital?
Yes, many times.
Where is your village?
My village is in Lohaghat. It is called Raushaal.
output: Myaar gaon Lohaghat ka taraf cha. Naam cha Raushaal.

instruction: When did you last visited your village?
output: Pichali baar gaon kab gaye tu?

instruction: I visited last year in October.
output: Me pichal saal October ma gaye chyai.

instruction: Do you have electricity in your village?
No.
How many cows and goats do you have?
We have 2 cows and 5 goats.
output: Myar dui gaur aur paanch bakhara chan.

instruction: How was the wheat crop last year?
output: Geehoon ki fasal kan che pichal saal?

instruction: Not too good. The standing crop was destroyed by the rain.
output: Jada badhiya ni che. Barkhaa na saari khadi fasal barbaad kar dyai.

instruction: How was the rain in previous season?
My name is Kamal
How are you?
I am fine. How are you?
output: Me theek chaun. Tu kan che?

instruction: How are other members of the family?
output: Ghar maa(n) aur log kan chan?

instruction: They all are fine.
What are you doing these days?
I am teaching in a school.
output: Me ek school maa(m) padhanoo chau(n).

instruction: Where do you live?
I live in Pushp Vihar near Saket
output: Me saket ka bagal maa(n) pushp vihar maa(n).

instruction: Who else lives with you?
output: Tyar dagad aur ku ku rahndan?

instruction: I live with my parents, younger sister, elder brother and bhabi.
output: Me maji, pitaji, choti bhuli, bhai aur bhabhi dagad.

instruction: So your elder brother got married? When?
output: O.. badu bhaai ka byoh kab hwaai?

instruction: Last year.
In which class is your sister studying?
output: Bhuli kai class maa(n) padhni cha?

instruction: She is studying in 11th class.
What are doing this Sunday?
output: Ye itvaar kun tu kyaa kani che?

instruction: Nothing planned as such.
output: Abhi ta kuch khaas ni cha.

instruction: Why don't you come to our home on Sunday?
output: Tu myaar ghar kilai ni aie jandi itvaar kun?

instruction: Everyone will be happy to see you after such a long time.
output: Sab log khush whal twetai dekhi kan.

instruction: I myself want to see them all. I will try to come on Sunday
output: Me khud bhi woon tai milnu cha(n)dhu. Theek cha me dekhud chaun itvaar kun

instruction: Ok. I shall leave now.
output: Theek cha. Ab me chaldu chau(n).
